index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Public Health Department; authorizing the execution of a contract modification with the State Department of Social and Health Services, to provide for the purchase of Maternal and Child Health supplies and equipment; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1977 Budget of said Department; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, and declaring the Emergency therefor.
